metadata.name: Bud Light N3XT 1
metadata.description:
Introducing our first ever NFT drop – the Bud Light N3XT Collection. This collection is comprised of 12,722 generative tokens that celebrate innovation, community and the next generation of creators. Each NFT combines a two-part background with an icon that represents beer, culture, gaming, music, and entertainment. This NFT is your key to the world of Bud Light NEXT. Always Enjoy Responsibly.

© 2022 Anheuser-Busch InBev BUD LIGHT ® BEER, St. Louis, MO.

This project and rewards are only obtainable by 21+ (or legal drinking age) NFT collectors. [Terms and Conditions apply](https://www.ab-inbev.com/nftterms/).

Please HODL responsibly.
